You pull weeds your gonna get some grass, you do treat cancer you will get good cells with it, you go after terrorist there will be innocent casualties. Comment: I’m no “supposed conservative” I am a simple conservative who also happens to be witness to some of the additional cuts and some of the impact it has had.     I’m not being emotional, sarcastic or bitter. I am however being hopeful that the federal support that was really helping the those that can, assist those that needed it most, will come back someday.  That’s all, it’s a wish and a prayer.
Author: Darstanter

Comment: Foodbanks replying on federal programs have been gutted. TN just lost 700K worth of food that would go directly to those that need it especially kids.....wiped. Local Volunteers that relied on a pittance in grants that were assisting already overrun operations for the worst off of us are now completely cancelled state wide as well.  People currently running out of stocked food and our local growers are having a hard time getting enough to help.  Churches are doing what they can... all of this feels like an oversite more than an intent.     I am praying that we gain enough resources back that we can assist those that need it most.
